name: Vertigo: Terminal Velocity
description:
A type of endless runner, where you continue falling down a tunnel. Kill enemy drones and collect gems for score and money. Money collected can be used to buy upgrades or new guns.

Currently, only the bare basics of the game are developed. Planned update:

  • More level, obstacles and enemy type
  • Shop for buy guns and upgrade
  • A menu where you can put your own music for BGM
  • Online scoreboard

Instruction:

  • WASD - Movement
  • LMB - Shoot
  • Avoid orange obstacles, kill red drones, and collect green gems.
